errors.error_description: Used pip install with conda-specific --channel parameter which is invalid syntax
Instruction to install llvmlite using pip before compiling and installing it yourself creates logical order confusion
correction_candidates: If you don't want to use our pre-built packages, you can compile and install llvmlite yourself. The documentation will teach you how:
After installing our pre-built packages, you can also compile and install llvmlite yourself. The documentation will teach you how:
Before using our pre-built packages, you should first compile and install llvmlite yourself. The documentation will teach you how:
To supplement our pre-built packages, you can compile and install additional llvmlite components yourself. The documentation will teach you how:
errors.golden_answer: If you don't want to use our pre-built packages, you can compile and install llvmlite yourself. The documentation will teach you how:
